    IPC-IV Papers

    These are the papers that were presented at the Fourth International Python Conference. (See also the minutes of the sessions.)

    Networking Topics

    Grail
    Guido van Rossum

    What's in a name? A Distributed, Federated Naming System in Python (Gzipped postscript)
    David Arnold, Andy Bond, Martin Chilvers (presenter), Richard Taylor

    Hector: Distributed Objects in Python
    David Arnold (presenter), Andy Bond, Martin Chilvers, Richard Taylor

    Using Python in a Distributed Object System (ABB Object Management Facility)
    Daniel Larsson

    Systems & Integrations

    Using Emacs OO-Browser with python
    Harri Pasanen

    Python Interface with Narcisse Graphics
    Zane Motteler

    Gist: A Scientific Graphics Package for Python
    Lee Busby

    Building a Programmable Interface for Physics Codes Using Numeric Python (Compressed Postscript)
    Tser-Yuan (Brian) Yang (presenter), P. F. Dubois, Zane Motteler

    Building Ariel - OpenGL GUI and Python to C
    Jim Hugunin

    State of the Art

    Extensibility in Python
    Manus Hand

    Using SWIG to Control, Prototype, and Debug C Programs with Python
    David M. Beazley

    Python Future

    Python 1.4 And Beyond
    Guido van Rossum (who else?-)
    For comments on this web page, send email to webmaster@python.org.
